content.raw:
actually that's a new issue I have to fix..

we're mainly looking at the problem where ogre plugindir was not set:
https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/270/console

CMake is producing the following msg, which is not a good sign:

```
Package OGRE was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `OGRE.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
No package 'OGRE' found
```
